So, what you are saying is, there should never be a ban on anything? Banning armed robberies does not prevent armed robberies, but it does reduce the number of them. Banning the dumping of toxic waste in our drinking water supply does not prevent some idiots from doing so, but it does reduce the number of incidents by responsible, thinking people. No law is perfect but laws do have beneficial outcomes for society.
